    Main View Controller

    Manages the main view.

      Gets the flights list
      void goToChartView​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Changes the view to show a pie chart with the number of flights per destination.
      void initialize()
      Initializes the FXML view.
      void modify​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Updates a flight data without having to delete and add it again to the list.
      void showAllFlights()
      Shows every flight from the flights list in the table.
      void showFlightDurationAverage()
      Calculates the duration average of all the flights, and show the result in an Alert.
      void showFlightsCurrentCity()
      Shows all the flights to the city of the currently selected flight in the table.
      void showLongFlights()
      Shows all the flights whose duration is longer than 3 hours.
      void showNextFiveFlights()
      Shows only the next 5 flights that will depart from the airport.

      • initialize

      • showAllFlights

        public void showAllFlights()
        Shows every flight from the flights list in the table.

      • showFlightsCurrentCity

        public void showFlightsCurrentCity()
        Shows all the flights to the city of the currently selected flight in the table. If no flight is selected, then this choice will cause an error alert.

      • showLongFlights

        public void showLongFlights()
        Shows all the flights whose duration is longer than 3 hours.

      • showNextFiveFlights

        public void showNextFiveFlights()
        Shows only the next 5 flights that will depart from the airport.

      • showFlightDurationAverage

        public void showFlightDurationAverage()
        Calculates the duration average of all the flights, and show the result in an Alert.

        Fills the filter choice with the filter options.
